name: Dungeon of Lost Souls
description:
Dungeon of Lost Souls is a short 2D action platformer with dungeon themed levels and pixel art sprites.

- Controlls -

  • "AD or Arrow keys" to move.
  • "Space, W, and Up-Arrow key" to jump.
  • "E, I, Q or Mouse1" to shoot.
  • "Esc" to pause.

- Notes -

This game was my introduction to game making and unity. It was a very fun experience, and I hope that whoever plays this will enjoy it.

Since this is my first game, I'd appreciate any feedback to improve in my next projects. Thanks!
